property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is destroyed from your Life Deck, you may place it into play.) CONTINUOUS POWER: Your Styled attacks deal +1 life card of damage. At the bbeginning of your turn, banish the top 2 cards of your opponent\'s discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Power: Discard a card at random from your opponent\'s hand. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (If you have destroyed or banished cards from a player\'s Life Deck this combat, you may play this card to stop an energy attack instead.) SHIELD POWER: Stop a physical attack. Raise or lower a player\'s anger 1 level. (Banish after use.)

property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only. You may only have one \'Black Punt\' attached.) Physical attack costing 1 stage. Attach to your MP. While attached, cards that you own are considered Styled. Banish this card when your opponent\'s MP advances a level. DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. Lower your opponent\'s anger 1 level. Until the start of your next turn, after a player gains anger, lower that player\'s anger 1 level. Damage from this attack cannot be prevented or modified. DAMAGE: 4 life cards. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is discarded from your hand during combat, your next attack this combat is considered a copied attack.) SHIELD POWER: Prevent 3 life cards and 3 stages of damage from an attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Destroy the top X cards of your opponent\'s Life Deck. X = the number of Earth Dragon Balls you control.

INSTANT POWER: Use when you Rejuvenate. Banish that many cards from the top of your opponent\'s discard pile instead of Rejuvenating.

property.value: (Limit 2 per deck. You may place this card from your hand to the bottom of your Life deck as an action to gain 2 stages. CONTINUOUS POWER: Players can only play one card during their Planning Step.

property.value: POWER: Reveal the top 4 cards of your Life deck. Your opponent separates those cards into 2 piles. Place one pile into your hand and the other on top of your Life Deck in any order. Destroy the top 2 cards of your Life Deck. (Banish after use.)

property.value: Energy Combat

property.value: (After performing a successful attack, you may discard this card from your hand to draw a card. If you do, that attack is considered to deal critical damage.) POWER: Rejuvenate 3. Choose a personality in play. THat personality loses 3 stages.

property.value: Energy attack costing 1 stage. Raise your anger 1 level. Whenever your opponent\'s MP changes levels this combat, set their power level to 0. Whenever you use a critical damage effect this combat, choose a personality in play. THat personality loses 1 stage. DAMAGE: 5 stages. HIT: This attack stays in play to be used a second time this combat. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Text
property.value: (This card is considered Styled.) CONTINUOUS POWER: At the beginning of each player\'s turn, destroy the top X cards of that player\'s Life Deck. X = the number of Earth Dragon Balls the owner of this Drill owns in play. POWER: Choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. If you control 3 or more Earth Dragon Balls, you may choose 2 instead.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

HIT: You may choose a non-personality/non-Mastery card you control in play. If you do, your opponent gains control of it and choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.value: (If your MP is a Saiyan, you may use this Power regardless of your MP\'s power stage.) SHIELD POWER: Prevent all damage from a physical attack. If your MP is Vegeta, you may use this Power a second time this combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (If your MP is a Saiyan and the highest power level on your MP\'s Level 4 is 500,000 or less, your Life Deck may include up to 3 copies of this card and you may use this Power regardless of your MP\'s power stage.) POWER: Physical attack. Banish the top card of your opponent\'s discard pile. DAMAGE: 2 life cards or 2 stages.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (If your MP is Bardock, once per combat you may place this card into play from your hand at 2 power stages above 0 to stop a hysical or energy attack.) CONTINUOUS POWER: Effects that destroy cards from the top of a player\'s Life Deck have that amount increased by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Whenever a player searches your oponent\'s Life Deck, you may raise your anger 1 level. POWER: Destroy the top card of your Life Deck. Your opponent reveals their hand. Search your opponent\'s LIfe Deck for a card and destroy it.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your opponent lays with their hand revealed. Whenever an effect destroys cards from your opponent\'s Life Deck, you may raise your anger 1 level. POWER: Destroy the top card of your Life Deck to banish the bottom card of your oponent\'s discard pile. You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your opponent plays with their hand revealed. POWER: Search your opponent\'s Life Deck for up to 3 Styled cards and destroy them. Reveal the top 4 cards of your Life Deck and place them back in any order. Your opponent skips their next action this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your opponent plays with their hand revealed. At the end of each turn, your opponent discards their hand. POWER: Gain 4 stages. Destroy the top 3 cards of a player\'s Life Deck. The first Styled Setup destroyed by this effect is placed into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your attacks deal their life card damage as stages of damage instead. INSTANT POWER: Use after your attack deals 5 or more stages of damage. That attack is considered to deal critical damage. Raise your anger 2 levels. POWER: Rejuvenate 1. You may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your attacks deal their life card damage as stages of damage instead. Your attacks deal +1 stage of damage. POWER: Physical attack. Rejuvenate 1. This attack is considered to deal critical damage. DAMAGE: 5 stages. HIT: Raise your anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your attacks deal their life card damage as stages of damage instead. Your attacks that deal 5 or more stages of damage are considered to deal critical damage. Whenever you deal critical damage, you may raise your anger 1 level. PPOWER: Physical attack. DAMAGE: 6 stages. HIT: Raise your anger 1 level. Rejuvenate 2. Banish an opponent\'s Setup, Drill or Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your attacks deal their life card damage as stages of damage instead. Your attacks that deal 5 or more stages of damage are considered to deal critical damage. Personalities cannot eb more than 5 stages above 0. POWER: Gain 3 stages. Choose a personality in play. That personality loses 3 stages.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: After an Earth Dragon Ball enters play, destroy the top card of your opponent\'s Life Deck. POWER: Energy attack costing 1 stage. You may shuffle an Earth Dragon Ball in play back into its owner\'s Life Deck to search your LIfe Deck for a Styled Drill and play it. DAMAGE: 3 life cards. HIT: raise your anger 1 level or Rejuvenate 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Your Drills are not discarded when advancing or lowering from this level.) POWER: Energy attack costing 1 stage. Capture an Earth Dragon Ball or choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. DAMAGE: 3 life cards. HIT: If you control 3 or more Earth Dragon Balls, search your LIfe Deck for a Styled Drill and place it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: (When you advance to this level, you may shuffle a Dragon Ball in play back into its owner\'s Life Deck. Search your Banished Zone for an Earth Dragon Ball and place it into play.) CONTINUOUS POWER: When you control 3 or more Earth Dragon Balls, your oponent\'s attacks deal -3 stages of damage and your energy attacks deal +3 life cards of damage. POWER: Raise your anger 1 level. You may banish an Earth Dragon ball you control. If you do, search your Banished Zone for a Dragon Ball or Styled Drill and Rejuvenate it.

property.name: Text
property.value: (When you reach this level, cature an Earth Dragon Ball or place a Dragon Ball from your Banished Zone into play.) POWER: Energy attack costing 1 stage. If 5 or more Earth Dragon Balls are in play and/or in your Banished Zone, search your discard pile for a Styled Drill and play it and this attack cannot be stopped. DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your attacks deal +2 stages of damage. POWER: Physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. DAMAGE: AT +2 stages. HIT: Destroy a Drill.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your attacks without \'anger\' printed in the text-box gain \'Raise your anger 1 level.\' POWER: Physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. This attack is considered to deal critical damage. DAMAGE: 4 stages.

If you do, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your opponent plays with their hand revealed. POWER: Search your opponent\'s Life Deck for up to 3 Styled cards and destroy them. Reveal the top 4 cards of your Life Deck and place them back in any order. Your opponent skips their next action this combat.
